Posts.Content: Feb 4, 2018 10:49AM Chemistry91 wrote: Hi Janet, I think it’s great you are getting a second opinion. I wouldn’t hesitate to even get a 3rd. I also have PASH and it does not put you at a higher risk for breast cancer. From what I have been told and have read Tamoxifen will not stop the PASH or make it go away. I think treatment for PASH depends on if it has grown or changed. The Cleveland Clinic has a program that you can use to submit your scans a radiologist will interpret them and give you an opinion. Might be worth it.
Posts.Title: PASH - Pseudoangiomatous stromal hyperplasia gillianinnh djmammo
